name: Rosemary Infused Frango Churrasco Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 8 chicken drumsticks, skin and bone stilll on

recipeInstructions.text: Pierce the chicken legs with a fork multiple times.
Combine the butter with the rest of the ingredients.
Cover the chicken legs in the marinade and leave in the fridge in a bowl overnight.
Pre-heat the oven to 190Â°C or heat up your BBQ.
Roast in the oven in a baking dish for 40 minutes, taking out to baste with juices twice through cooking.
Remove from the oven and serve with a choice of condiments.
